00117 template <class Base>
00118 void TShapeBase<Base>::Invalidate(int /*changeFlags*/)
00119 {
00120        InvalidateBoundingBox();
00121 
00122        if (m_displayPtr != NULL){
00123               m_displayPtr->OnChangeShape(this);
00124        }
00125 }

00186 template <class Base>
00187 bool TShapeBase<Base>::IsDisplayConnected() const
00188 {
00189        I_ASSERT((m_displayPtr == NULL) || IsDisplayAccepted(*m_displayPtr));
00190 
00191        return (m_displayPtr != NULL);
00192 }

00222 template <class Base>
00223 TShapeBase<Base>::TShapeBase(const TShapeBase<Base>& shape)
00224        :      Base(shape)
00225 {
00226        I_ASSERT(shape.m_displayPtr == NULL);     // Copy contructor not allowed for shapes connected to view
00227 
00228        m_userColorShemaPtr = shape.m_userColorShemaPtr;
00229        m_displayPtr = NULL;
00230        m_isVisible = shape.m_isVisible;
00231        m_isBoundingBoxValid = false;
00232        m_shapeTransformMode = shape.m_shapeTransformMode;
00233        m_shapeTransform.Reset();
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 template <class Base>
00238 TShapeBase<Base>::~TShapeBase()
00239 {
00240        SetVisible(false);
00241 
00242        if (m_displayPtr != NULL){
00243               m_displayPtr->DisconnectShape(this);
00244        }
00245 }

00250 template <class Base>
00251 void TShapeBase<Base>::DisconnectFromModel()
00252 {
00253        imod::IModel* modelPtr = GetModelPtr();
00254        if (modelPtr != NULL){
00255               modelPtr->DetachObserver(this);
00256        }
00257 }

00271 template <class Base>
00272 i2d::CRect TShapeBase<Base>::GetBoundingBox() const
00273 {
00274        if (IsVisible()){
00275               if (!m_isBoundingBoxValid){
00276                      CalcBoundingBox(m_boundingBox);
00277               }
00278        }
00279        else{
00280               m_boundingBox.Reset();
00281        }
00282 
00283        m_isBoundingBoxValid = true;
00284 
00285        return m_boundingBox;
00286 }

00289 template <class Base>
00290 void TShapeBase<Base>::SetUserColorShema(const IColorShema* shemaPtr)
00291 {
00292        m_userColorShemaPtr = shemaPtr;
00293        if (m_displayPtr != NULL){
00294               m_displayPtr->OnChangeShape(this);
00295        }
00296 }

00301 template <class Base>
00302 void TShapeBase<Base>::OnConnectDisplay(IDisplay* displayPtr)
00303 {
00304        I_ASSERT(displayPtr != NULL);
00305        I_ASSERT(m_displayPtr == NULL);
00306        I_ASSERT(IsDisplayAccepted(*displayPtr));
00307 
00308        m_displayPtr = displayPtr;
00309 }
00310 
00311 
00312 template <class Base>
00313 void TShapeBase<Base>::OnDisconnectDisplay(IDisplay* I_IF_DEBUG(displayPtr))
00314 {
00315        I_ASSERT(displayPtr != NULL);
00316        I_ASSERT(displayPtr == m_displayPtr);
00317        m_displayPtr = NULL;
00318 }

00320 
00321 template <class Base>
00322 bool TShapeBase<Base>::OnDisplayChange(int flags)
00323 {
00324        if (flags & GetDisplayChangesMask()){
00325               InvalidateBoundingBox();
00326               if ((flags & CF_TRANSFORM) != 0){
00327                      InvalidateTransforms();
00328               }
00329               return true;
00330        }
00331        return false;
00332 }

00337 template <class Base>
00338 const IColorShema& TShapeBase<Base>::GetColorShema() const
00339 {
00340        I_ASSERT(IsDisplayConnected());
00341 
00342        if (m_userColorShemaPtr != NULL){
00343               return *m_userColorShemaPtr;
00344        }
00345        else{
00346               return m_displayPtr->GetColorShema();
00347        }
00348 }

00351 template <class Base>

00353 {
00354        I_ASSERT(IsDisplayConnected());
00355 
00356        return m_displayPtr->GetClientRect();

00360 template <class Base>
00361 void TShapeBase<Base>::DisconnectDisplay()
00362 {
00363        if (m_displayPtr != NULL){
00364               m_displayPtr->DisconnectShape(this);
00365               m_displayPtr = NULL;
00366        }
00367 }
